messages.subject: happy news for ozzies
messages.msgSnippet: All, I had this sent to me today, it came from a report in the Melbourne Age ( Newspaper ) Happy days indeed. Though it hasn t happened yet it appears it is
messages.messageBody:
All, I had this sent to me today, it came from a report in the Melbourne Age ( Newspaper ) Happy days indeed. Though it hasn't happened yet it appears it is only a matter of time.
Rich T

http://www.image-hosting.net/images/messageboard/retalt/Banned.JPG
